page.title: 05FARM TRAIL INTERVIEW
page.content: Q.hOW LONG HAS THE FARM TRAIL BEEN THERE ? A.IT HAS BEEN THERE ABOUT 15 YEARS. Q.HOW MANY ANIMALS DO YOU HAVE IN THE FARM TRAIL ? A.THERE ARE ABOUT 300 ANIMALS IN THE FARM TRAIL. Q.HOW LONG HAS IT BEEN OPEN TO THE PUBLIC ? A.THE FARM TRAIL HAS BEEN OPEN TO THE PUBLIC ABOUT 15 YEARS. Q.HOW MANY PEOPLE DO YOU HAVE VISITING THE FARM TRAIL IN ONE YEAR ? A.WE HAVE ABOUT 40,000 PEOPLE EVERY YEAR. Q.HOW MANY PEOPLE DO YOU HAVE SUPERVISING THE FARM TRAIL ? A.ONE PERSON SUPERVISES THE FARM TRAIL Q.HOW MANY FOREIGNERS DO YOU HAVE A YEAR ? A.WE HAVE MANY.
